name: Devlo town
description:
Explore and look around this so totally peaceful town...find items, complete quest, talks to NPCs and much more. walk around and look for items, explore in this little world of islands, hills, and oceans.

HOW TO PLAY

- Use "W, A, S, D" to move 

- Use "M" to open the minimap

- Use "I" to open inventory
